description:
Gourry and Amelia visit a land with a demon problem, and are tasked with confronting the creatures. Before the battle ends, they find that the demons are actually old familiar friends.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mesure adaptée ! Amélia au village de la justice !

The Right Person in the Right Place! Amelia in the Village of Justice!
